game.name: Two Worlds Digital Deluxe Content
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: On 82 pages the Digital Artbook offers you an extraordinary opportunity to immerse yourself in a world full of breathtaking details! The four exklusive In-Game Items make it easier for you to get into the game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: On 82 pages the Digital Artbook offers you an extraordinary opportunity to immerse yourself in a world full of breathtaking details! The four exklusive In-Game Items make it easier for you to get into the game.
